full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Well , we've settled the problems of price , quality and quantity . What mode of payment do you wish to employ ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Could you adopt D / A or D / P ? You see I have to pay a deposit when I open a letter of credit . That will tie up my funds and add to the cost of my imports , especially for such a huge order .
response_1: We usually prefer payment by confirmed, irrevocable letter of credit. This ensures secure payment for both parties and is our standard practice for international transactions of this size.
response_2: Irrevocable letter of credit , of course . It's the normal terms of payment in international business .

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: When do you want it delivered ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: What time exactly ?
response_1: I need it delivered tomorrow . Will that be possible ?
response_2: I can deliver it today or tomorrow. Which day would you prefer?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Retirement age is still 65 , but I think more and more people are retiring earlier , I think Bob's in upper fifties already , he just looks pretty young . Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Well , I think you prepare it well and capture good savings , retiring early can give you a lot more time for travel and other activities , you should get out and enjoy the life you still can't , don't you think ?
response_1: That's true, early retirement does sound appealing if you can manage it financially. I suppose having those extra years while you're still healthy and energetic would make a big difference in what you can actually do and enjoy.
response_2: Wow ... I thought he was early forty stops , why would he want to retire so soon ?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: So you must be an extravert ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: What do you think are the responsibilities of a tourist guide ?
response_1: I suppose I can be quite outgoing when I'm working with people, yes. Being able to connect with others and communicate clearly is definitely important in my line of work.
response_2: Yes , I always enjoy being with a group of people and chatting with them .

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Are you going to vote this Tuesday ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Have you figured out who you ’ re going to vote for ?
response_1: Yes, I'm planning to vote on Tuesday.
response_2: Yes , I am , and I am so excited .

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: We normally export CFR . Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: That can be discussed .
response_1: Would you be interested in exploring FOB terms instead, or do you have flexibility with the shipping arrangements?
response_2: What commission do you usually pay for your exports ? As you know , we import on commission basis .

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: That sounds very reasonable . Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Generally it is 6 months and during this period you are half-paid .
response_1: By the way , how long is my probation ?
response_2: What is the duration of the maternity leave policy?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: How do you know there was a break-in ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: I will send a squad car to your house right now .
response_1: Someone busted my window .
response_2: I came home and found my front door wide open and my living room completely ransacked. My TV, laptop, and jewelry box are all missing, and there are muddy footprints throughout the house.

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Would that be our standard card , our gold card , or our platinum card ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Well , the standard card has a lower credit limit , that's 20,000 RIB , whereas with the platinum card you can have a credit limit of 80,000 RIB .
response_1: What's the difference between them?
response_2: Oh , I'm not sure . What's the difference ?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Hello Mr Fang ! It's good to see you again . What can we do for you today ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: That shouldn't be a problem , Mr Fang . Have you got your Certificate of Use of Foreign Exchange Account and the Foreign Exchange Account Opening Notice with you ? Our most widely used currencies are US dollar , Japanese yen and Hong Kong dollar .
response_1: Hello , Miao Ping . I'd like to open a Foreign Currency Account today .
response_2: I'd like to open a foreign exchange account, please. I need to handle some international transactions for my business.

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Why is that ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: I see . How do I draw money for my own use then ?
response_1: It's primarily designed for business transactions . That is , writing checks to pay for bills , buying things and sending money . We won't expect a large amount of deposit in a current account .
response_2: The business account is designed for company transactions and has restrictions on personal withdrawals to maintain proper separation between business and personal finances. This helps with accounting and tax purposes.

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: It was for my Master Card . Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: I haven't got it in the mail yet .
response_1: I understand you're referring to your Master Card. When did you request it and what's the expected delivery timeframe? Typically cards arrive within XXXXXXX business days.
response_2: You should've gotten that bill two weeks ago .

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Oh great ! This stupid computer froze again ! That's the third time today ! Hey Samuel , can you come take a look at my PC ? It's acting again . It must have a virus or something . Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: But I'm quite careful when I'm browsing theinternet , I have no idea how I could have picked up a virus .
response_1: Let me take a look at it. You know, viruses can get onto your computer in many different ways, not just from browsing the internet. They can come from email attachments, USB drives, or even from legitimate websites that have been compromised.
response_2: Just give me a second . I'll be right up . I ran a virus scan on your computer , and it turns out that you have a lot of infected files !

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: are you ready for the meeting ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: it's challenging , but I'm enjoying it quite a bit .
response_1: yes , come on in . how's your new job going ?
response_2: Yes, I'm ready. How are you finding the new project so far?

The American dollar is now worth 7.45RMB.If you would like to sell RIB , we can give you a rate of 7.35.Will that be all right ?
response_1: I'd like to exchange XXXXXXX US dollars for Chinese yuan, please.
response_2: Well , that depends on the rate . How much is the RIB trading at today ?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Morning . May I help you ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Well , in that case , I think a checking account may be more convenient for you . However , there's a service charge .
response_1: I'd like to open a bank account. I'll be making frequent deposits and withdrawals for my business.
response_2: Yes . I'd like to open an account that enables me to draw money easily .

response_1: Not yet . What happened ?
response_2: No, I haven't had a chance to check the news yet today. What's happening?

response_2: Thank you! Our main office is located at XXXXXXX, but we're also opening several new branch locations across the city.

response_1: You mean the network connection ?
response_2: Are you having trouble with the internet connection? It sounds like there might be a network issue affecting your browsing speed.

response_1: I'm interested in exchanging some currency. I have US dollars and I'd like to convert them to the local currency, but I'm not sure if that's the best move since the US dollar seems quite weak right now.
